title: No tokens for an S+ gameplay
body: My ID is OMG Spectre, my Yasuo is currently at mastery 6 and I'm trying to get mastery 7. And what happened was I finished a Yasuo mid game with S+ rank, but nothing showed up, I thought I misclicked, but when I entered my loot box, it appeared that I didn't get a token for that. The only problem is that I didn't screenshot that S+ section. So, how would you solve this issue?{{champion:157}} {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
